rows.label: Option_Caption001
rows.name:
Choose whether to remember the cursor's last position
in the main menu.

rows.label: Option_Caption003
rows.name:
Choose whether to automatically set new missions to tracked
as they are accepted.

rows.label: Option_Caption004
rows.name:
Choose whether orders issued to party members should
apply to future battles.

rows.label: Option_Caption005
rows.name:
Choose the way in which the Navigation Ball is launched.
Once: Disappears after a certain amount of time.
Looping: Continuously guides you to your destination.

rows.label: Option_Caption006
rows.name:
Choose the behavior for jumping when the flight module is equipped.
(Jump: Press [ST:icon p1=zr ] while grounded to jump, then
press [ST:icon p1=zr ] while airborne to fly.
Flight: Press [ST:icon p1=zr ] to fly.)

rows.label: Option_Caption007
rows.name: Choose the control scheme for the Hraesvelg's cruise mode.

rows.label: Option_Caption008
rows.name: Choose whether to display subtitles during events.

rows.label: Option_Caption009
rows.name: Adjust the text speed for NPC dialogue boxes.

rows.label: Option_Caption010
rows.name: Choose how the camera behaves when [ST:icon p1=anar ] is tilted up or down.

rows.label: Option_Caption011
rows.name: Choose how the camera behaves when [ST:icon p1=anar ] is tilted left or right.

rows.label: Option_Caption012
rows.name:
Adjust how quickly the manual camera reacts to tilting [ST:icon p1=anar ].
Slow: The camera will accelerate and decelerate slowly.
Average: The camera will instantly start and stop.

rows.label: Option_Caption013
rows.name:
Adjust the speed at which the camera resets its position
to the default auto-camera positioning.

rows.label: Option_Caption014
rows.name:
Adjust the tracking speed of the automatic camera.
(This applies in the following situations:
- following behind characters in the field
- keeping the targeted enemy on-screen in combat)

rows.label: Option_Caption015
rows.name: Choose whether the camera tilts when flying in a Doll.

rows.label: Option_Caption016
rows.name:
Adjust the speed at which the manual camera rotates up, down, left,
and right.

rows.label: Option_Caption017
rows.name:
More finely adjust the speed at which the manual camera tilts
up and down.

rows.label: Option_Caption018
rows.name: Adjust the speed at which the camera zooms in and out.

rows.label: Option_Caption019
rows.name:
Choose whether the camera should automatically adjust itself when
moving over sloping surfaces (only in auto-camera mode).

rows.label: Option_Caption020
rows.name: Adjust the camera height when fully zoomed in (on foot).

rows.label: Option_Caption021
rows.name: Adjust the camera height when fully zoomed out (on foot).

rows.label: Option_Caption022
rows.name:
Choose where to position the camera in relation to
the player (on foot).

rows.label: Option_Caption023
rows.name: Adjust the camera height when fully zoomed in (in a Doll).

rows.label: Option_Caption024
rows.name: Adjust the camera height when fully zoomed out (in a Doll).

rows.label: Option_Caption025
rows.name:
Choose where to position the camera in relation to
the player (in a Doll).

rows.label: Option_Caption026
rows.name:
Choose how much farther the camera should zoom out from the player
upon boarding a Doll.
(This cannot exceed the maximum camera distance.)

rows.label: Option_Caption027
rows.name:
Choose the type of camera used when piloting the Hraesvelg
in cruise mode.
("Locked Camera" keeps the camera behind the Doll.)

rows.label: Option_Caption028
rows.name:
Adjust the brightness of the game world to improve visibility.
The higher the setting, the brighter the environment.

rows.label: Option_Caption030
rows.name:
Choose whether headgear can be seen.
(Set to Off if you'd like to be able to see your party members' faces.)

rows.label: Option_Caption032
rows.name: Choose whether to show the mini-map.

rows.label: Option_Caption033
rows.name:
Choose whether the orientation of the mini-map should be fixed
or allowed to rotate. (While enabled, north is up.)

rows.label: Option_Caption034
rows.name:
Choose whether party members' statuses
should remain on screen at all times.

rows.label: Option_Caption035
rows.name: Choose whether to display Doll fuel gauges.

rows.label: Option_Caption036
rows.name: Choose whether to display the weather and time of day.

rows.label: Option_Caption037
rows.name:
Choose whether to display the system log (notifications about
obtained items, earned experience, etc.).

rows.label: Option_Caption038
rows.name:
Choose whether to display notifications regarding information
(gossip overheard by passing next to NPCs, BLADE reports, etc.).

rows.label: Option_Caption039
rows.name: Choose whether to display information regarding field UI controls.

rows.label: Option_Caption040
rows.name:
Choose whether to display text boxes for Soul Voice prompts in battle.
(Soul Voice prompts can still be answered even when set to "Off.")

rows.label: Option_Caption041
rows.name:
Choose whether to display descriptions of Arts under
the Arts Palette in combat.

rows.label: Option_Caption042
rows.name:
Choose whether to display the detailed status of your
currently-targeted enemy at the top of the screen.

rows.label: Option_Caption043
rows.name:
Choose whether to restrict target cycling to enemies already in battle.
(Useful for players who prefer not to aggro unwanted enemies.)

rows.label: Option_Caption044
rows.name: Choose whether to display basic status info above enemies.

rows.label: Option_Caption045
rows.name: Choose whether to display basic status info above NPCs.

rows.label: Option_Caption046
rows.name: Choose whether to display basic status info above objects.

rows.label: Option_Caption047
rows.name:
Choose whether to display story mission icons in the game field.
(This will not affect icons on the map and mini-map.)

rows.label: Option_Caption048
rows.name:
Choose whether to display affinity mission icons in the game field.
(This will not affect icons on the map and mini-map.)

rows.label: Option_Caption049
rows.name:
Choose whether to display normal mission icons in the game field.
(This will not affect icons on the map and mini-map.)

rows.label: Option_Caption050
rows.name:
Choose whether to display basic mission icons in the game field.
(This will not affect icons on the map and mini-map.)

rows.label: Option_Caption051
rows.name:
Choose whether to display icons for tracked materials in the game field.
(This will not affect icons on the map and mini-map.)

rows.label: Option_Caption052
rows.name:
Choose whether to display icons for squad tasks in the game field.
(This will not affect icons on the map and mini-map.)

rows.label: Option_Caption053
rows.name: Choose whether to display story mission updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption054
rows.name: Choose whether to display affinity mission updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption055
rows.name: Choose whether to display normal mission updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption056
rows.name: Choose whether to display basic mission updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption057
rows.name: Choose whether to display segment recon updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption058
rows.name: Choose whether to display material tracking updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption059
rows.name: Choose whether to display squad task updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption060
rows.name:
Choose whether to display all social notifications.
Manual: Toggle whether to display social notifications by category.

rows.label: Option_Caption061
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
players join or leave your squad.

rows.label: Option_Caption062
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
you have unlocked achievements.

rows.label: Option_Caption063
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
other players have unlocked achievements.

rows.label: Option_Caption064
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
you are able to claim Union rewards.

rows.label: Option_Caption065
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
you are able to claim scout rewards.

rows.label: Option_Caption066
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
you are able to claim Global Nemesis rewards.

rows.label: Option_Caption067
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
BLADE operatives you have scouted gain a scout level.

rows.label: Option_Caption068
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
your avatar has been scouted by other players.

rows.label: Option_Caption069
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
you scout other players' BLADE operatives.

rows.label: Option_Caption070
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when five minutes
remain until other players' BLADE operatives return home.

rows.label: Option_Caption071
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
other players' BLADE operatives have returned home.

rows.label: Option_Caption072
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
friends have entered online mode.

rows.label: Option_Caption073
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
squad tasks have been commenced.

rows.label: Option_Caption074
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
a squad task has been completed.

rows.label: Option_Caption075
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
another player has started recruiting for an online mission.

rows.label: Option_Caption076
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
new online missions are available.

rows.label: Option_Caption077
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the Global Nemesis Telethia Plume has spawned.

rows.label: Option_Caption078
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the number of times you can attempt to battle the
Global Nemesis Telethia Plume has been reset.

rows.label: Option_Caption079
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the RP of the Global Nemesis Telethia Plume has
dropped below a certain point.

rows.label: Option_Caption080
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the Global Nemesis Telethia Plume has been defeated.

rows.label: Option_Caption081
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the Global Nemesis Yggralith Zero has spawned.

rows.label: Option_Caption082
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the number of times you can attempt to battle the
Global Nemesis Yggralith Zero has been reset.

rows.label: Option_Caption083
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the RP of the Global Nemesis Yggralith Zero has
dropped below a certain point.

rows.label: Option_Caption084
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
the Global Nemesis Yggralith Zero has been defeated.

rows.label: Option_Caption085
rows.name:
Open the tips screen each time you recieve a new tip.
Off: You will only receive notifications of new tips,
which can be viewed as needed.

rows.label: Option_Caption086
rows.name: Choose whether to display notifications of new tips.

rows.label: Option_Caption087
rows.name: Choose whether to display helpful hints.

rows.label: Option_Caption088
rows.name: Choose whether to display affinity updates.

rows.label: Option_Caption089
rows.name: Choose whether to display survey rate reward info.

rows.label: Option_Caption090
rows.name:
Choose whether the game should begin in online or offline mode
upon loading save data.
Always Ask: Gives you the option each time you load.

rows.label: Option_Caption091
rows.name:
Choose whether to show or hide your online status on
other players' following lists.

rows.label: Option_Caption092
rows.name:
Choose whether to automatically register your current avatar
for the purposes of BLADE scouting.

rows.label: Option_Caption093
rows.name: Adjust the volume of background music.

rows.label: Option_Caption094
rows.name: Adjust the volume of sound effects.

rows.label: Option_Caption095
rows.name: Adjust the volume of characters' voices.

rows.label: Option_Caption097
rows.name: Adjust the volume of system-related sound effects.

rows.label: Option_Caption099
rows.name: Choose the background music that plays while flying in a Doll.

rows.label: Option_Caption100
rows.name:
Choose between English and Japanese for
the language of the in-game voices.

rows.label: Option_Caption101
rows.name:
Choose whether to display social notifications for when
hidden online missions have been unlocked.

rows.label: Option_Caption102
rows.name: Choose whether to display menu control guides.

rows.label: Option_Caption103
rows.name:
Choose whether to skip over the usual prompt when accepting
story, affinity and normal missions.
(When On: Normal missions will be accepted automatically. Story and
affinity missions can still be turned down on the mission overview window.)
